label: Fashion Stances
prompt_text: Use the uploaded CHARACTER REFERENCE IMAGE as the exact identity. Do not redesign the character. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. Background: clean white studio. FRAMES: 1. Front view, full body, neutral fashion stance 2. Back view, full body, upright posture 3. Side profile, full body, relaxed stance 4. Front view, full body, arms extended outward 5. Low-angle full body view, camera near ground 6. Top-down full body view, camera directly overhead
constraints: Exact 3x2 grid, exactly 6 frames
All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers between frames
Same character, outfit, proportions, facial features, and lighting in every frame
No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays

label: Floating Poses
prompt_text: Use the uploaded CHARACTER REFERENCE IMAGE as the exact identity. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. Environment: pure white void. FRAMES: 1. Worm-eye view looking up at floating character 6. Top-down view of character floating cross-legged

All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers

label: Hand Gestures
prompt_text: Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES) focused on HANDS ONLY. Resolution: 8K. Background: clean white void. FRAMES: 1. Relaxed open hand pose 2. Hands framing the face area 3. Hands reaching upward toward camera 4. Hands near head with interlocked tension 5. Over-the-shoulder reach into space 6. Top-down view with hands arranged symmetrically
